Package com.terremark

Provides the classes necessary for interfacing with the Terremark API.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComputePoolHandler Provides API calls for top level objects with in an compute pool: Resource Template Virtual machine Detached disk Operating system family
EnvironmentHandler Provides API calls for objects with in an environment: Compute pool Network summary Physical device Retry operation Task Layout Row Group
NetworkHandler Provides API calls for top level objects with in an network: Network Trusted network group Public IP Firewall rule Firewall log IP address Network host Internet services Backup Internet services Monitor Node service RNAT
OrganizationHandler Provides API calls for top level objects with in an organization: Organization Environment Tag Location Catalog Bandwidth Alert SSH key Support ticket Administrative organization User Contact API key Audit log Role Business operation
TerremarkClient Terremark client interface.
 

Class Summary
TerremarkFactory Factory that provider various utility methods.
 

Package com.terremark Description

Provides the classes necessary for interfacing with the Terremark API.

TerremarkFactory.getClient(com.terremark.config.PropertiesBuilder) can be used to build an instance of TerremarkClient. The client instance provides four different handlers. Each handler provides a subset of the Terremark API calls. OrganizationHandler, EnvironmentHandler, ComputePoolHandler and NetworkHandler together provide all the necessary API calls.

TerremarkFactory provides factory methods line TerremarkFactory.getId(com.terremark.api.Resource). This call along with other calls provide utility methods necessary for invoking some API calls.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Seshu Pasam
See Also:
com.terremark.api, com.terremark.config, com.terremark.exception
